trend_summary: Imagery reveals modest outward growth of the main settlement in the east, steady clearing of forest into patchwork fields, denser farm‚Äêroad grid, and a noticeable late-period vegetation browning/harvest. Built areas remain a small fraction of the landscape, keeping an overall rural, low-density character.
notable_changes: Built-up zone on eastern flank expands gradually and becomes brighter/denser.
Forested blocks in central and western sectors are incrementally replaced by fields.
Agricultural patchwork enlarges southward, creating more uniform cropland.
New or widened linear corridors suggest road or infrastructure additions.
Final image shows widespread vegetation browning, likely harvest or seasonal shift.
